author: Cortex XSOAR

integration.description: Cloud access security broker that enables to find, understand, and secure cloud apps. Deprecated. Use Netskope (API v1) instead.
integration.name: Netskope (Deprecated)

commands.description: Get alerts generated by Netskope. You may choose what alerts to receive with the alert_type parameter. You must provide start_time and end_time, or insertion_start_time and insertion_end_time. (Note that if end_time or insertion_end_time aren't provided. the date time would be set as now.) You cannot provide a combination of the options mentioned above.
commands.name: netskope-alert-list

commands.description: Get events extracted from SaaS traffic. You may choose what events to receive with the event_type parameter. You must provide start_time and end_time, or insertion_start_time and insertion_end_time. (Note that if end_time or insertion_end_time aren't provided, the date time would be set as now.) You cannot provide a combination of the options mentioned above.
commands.name: netskope-event-list

commands.description: Update the URL list with the values provided. Note that this command overrides the list.
commands.name: netskope-url-list-update

commands.description: Get all URL lists or a specific URL list by specifying the list ID.
commands.name: netskope-url-lists-list

commands.description: Delete a URL list by the list ID.
commands.name: netskope-url-list-delete

commands.description: Get information about Netskope SCIM users. The command provides a list of users who have been imported into the Netskope tenant through SCIM integration. Users imported through other methods, such as manual CSV import or manual creation, will not be included in the returned results.
commands.name: netskope-client-list

integration.description: Netskope API v2 provides a powerful interface for managing and monitoring Netskope deployments. It enables users to retrieve alerts and events, manage URL lists, and control clients. With Netskope API v2, organizations can proactively respond to security threats, enforce web access policies, and efficiently administer their Netskope environment.
integration.name: Netskope (API v2)

commands.description: Get events extracted from SaaS traffic and or logs. You must provide start_time and end_time, or insertion_start_time and insertion_end_time, or timeperiod. Also, you cannot provide a combination of the options mentioned above.
commands.name: netskope-event-list

commands.description: Get alerts generated by Netskope, including policy, DLP, and watch list alerts. You must provide start_time and end_time, or insertion_start_time and insertion_end_time, or timeperiod. Also, you cannot provide a combination of the options mentioned above.
commands.name: netskope-alert-list

commands.description: Take an action on a quarantined file.
commands.name: netskope-quarantined-file-update

commands.description: Update the URL List with the values provided. The command will override the whole list content, rather than appending the new values.
commands.name: netskope-url-list-update

commands.description: Update file hash list with the values provided. The command will override the whole list content, rather than appending the new values.
commands.name: netskope-file-hash-list-update

commands.description: Get information about the Netskope clients.
commands.name: netskope-client-list

commands.description: List all users of certain host by its hostname.
commands.name: netskope-host-associated-user-list

commands.description: List all hosts related to a certain username.
commands.name: netskope-user-associated-host-list

integration.description: Get alerts and events, manage quarantine files as well as URL and hash lists using Netskope API v1.
integration.name: Netskope (API v1)

description: Cloud access security broker that enables to find, understand, and secure cloud apps.
name: Netskope
